scripts.prepare:mainnet: js-yaml config/mainnet.yaml | mustache - subgraph.yaml.handlebars > subgraph.yaml && js-yaml config/mainnet.yaml | mustache - src/utils/constants.ts.handlebars > src/utils/constants.ts
scripts.deploy:mainnet: yarn prepare:mainnet && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ muffin/muffin
scripts.prepare:rinkeby: js-yaml config/rinkeby.yaml | mustache - subgraph.yaml.handlebars > subgraph.yaml && js-yaml config/rinkeby.yaml | mustache - src/utils/constants.ts.handlebars > src/utils/constants.ts
scripts.deploy:rinkeby: yarn prepare:rinkeby && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ virtues-milkier/muffin-rinkeby
scripts.prepare:hardhat: js-yaml config/hardhat.yaml | mustache - subgraph.yaml.handlebars > subgraph.yaml && js-yaml config/hardhat.yaml | mustache - src/utils/constants.ts.handlebars > src/utils/constants.ts
scripts.deploy:hardhat: yarn prepare:hardhat && graph deploy --node http://localhost:8020/ --ipfs http://localhost:5001 virtues-milkier/muffin-rinkeby
